hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select count(*) from SOC0124 ei where 1=1
select ei.* from SOC0124 ei where 1=1
select A.EIID from SOC0118 A, SOC0107 B, SOC0109 C where A.EIID = B.EIID and A.EIVERSION = B.CIVERSION and C.CID = B.CID

SELECT ecount.* FROM( SELECT esyscoding as cid ,ename as cvalue,SUM(CASE WHEN eiid IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) total FROM ( SELECT B.esyscoding,B.ename,C.eiid FROM IG117 B LEFT OUTER JOIN IG013 C ON (B.esyscoding = substr(C.esyscoding,1,12)

SELECT ecount.* FROM( SELECT esyscoding as cid ,ename as cvalue,SUM(CASE WHEN eiid IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) total FROM ( SELECT B.esyscoding,B.ename,C.eiid FROM IG117 B LEFT OUTER JOIN IG013 C ON (B.esyscoding = substr(C.esyscoding,1,12)

SELECT ecount.* FROM( SELECT esyscoding as cid ,ename as cvalue,SUM(CASE WHEN eiid IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) total FROM ( SELECT B.esyscoding,B.ename,C.eiid FROM IG117 B LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ei.* FROM IG013 ei where ei.EIID IN ( select D.EIID from IG013 D, IG800 E, IG225 F where D.EIID = E.EIID and D.EISTATUS='U' and D.EIVERSION = E.CIVERSION and F.CID = E.CID

select b.orgsyscoding,b.orgname,a.count from ORGANIZATION b LEFT OUTER JOIN (select B.CIVALUE,count(B.CIVALUE) as count from IG013 A, IG800 B, IG225 C where A.EIID = B.EIID and A.EIVERSION = B.CIVERSION and C.CID = B.CID
SELECT distinct ccdcategory,ccdlabel FROM IG545 where ccdtype=:ccdtype and ccdstatus=:ccdstatus ORDER BY ccdcategory

SELECT ci.* FROM (SELECT C.eiid, C.eilabel, C.einame, '' as srename, C.cid, C.eid, C.cname, C.cdesc, C.cunit, C.cstatus, C.ccategory, C.cseq, C.clabel, C.coption, C.cattach, C.crequired, C.esyscoding, C.corder, D.ciid, D.civalue, D.ciupdtime, D.ciexpire, D.cistatus, D.civersion, D.cismallversion, D.civerinfo, D.cicurver FROM (SELECT A.eiid, A.eiversion, A.eismallversion, A.eilabel, A.einame, B.eid, B.esyscoding, B.cid, B.cname, B.cdesc, B.cunit, B.cstatus, B.ccategory, B.cseq, B.clabel, B.coption, B.crequired, B.cattach, B.corder FROM IG013 A, (SELECT eid, cid, cname, cdesc, cunit, cstatus, ccategory, cseq, clabel, coption, crequired, cattach, esyscoding, CORDER FROM IG225 WHERE esyscoding in (:esyscodingList) AND cstatus != '2'

) B WHERE A.eiid = :eiid) C left outer join IG800 D ON (C.cid = D.cid AND C.eiid = D.eiid AND C.eiversion = D.civersion AND C.eismallversion = D.cismallversion)) ci order by ci.ccategory, ci.corder, ci.eid, ci.cid
) B WHERE A.eiid = :eiid) C left outer join IG800 D ON (C.cid = D.cid AND C.eiid = D.eiid) where D.civersion=:civersion) ci order by ci.ccategory, ci.corder, ci.eid, ci.cid

SELECT ecount.* FROM ( select d.room_eiid as room_id, d.room_einame as room_name, d.eiid as container_id, d.einame as container_name, e.eid as eid, e.eilabel as eilabel, e.U_VALUE as position, e.ename as ename, e.model as model from IG912 e inner join IG778 d on(e.container_eiid=d.eiid
SELECT VERSIONTIME.* FROM( SELECT C.civersion, C.cismallversion, MAX(C.ciupdtime) as ciupdtime FROM IG800 C WHERE C.eiid=:eiid GROUP BY C.civersion, C.cismallversion order by C.civersion )VERSIONTIME

select vm.* from( select distinct e.eiid, e.einame, e.eilabel, e.eidesc, e.eiusername, e.eiinsdate, e.fingerPrint, e.eid, e.eiupdtime, e.eistatus, e.eiversion, e.eiorgsyscoding, e.esyscoding, e.eiuserid,e.eirootmark,e.eismallversion from IG313 r, IG013 e where e.eiid = r.pareiid and eirrelationcode like '%009%' and r.cldeiid in (select v.eiid from IG688 V where 1=1

SELECT * FROM IG313 a INNER JOIN ( SELECT pareiid, MAX(parversion) AS parversion, MAX(parsmallversion) AS parsmallversion, cldeiid, MAX(cldversion) AS cldversion, MAX(cldsmallversion) AS cldsmallversion FROM IG313 GROUP BY pareiid, cldeiid) b ON (a.pareiid = b.pareiid AND a.parversion = b.parversion AND a.parsmallversion = b.parsmallversion AND a.cldeiid = b.cldeiid AND a.cldversion = b.cldversion AND a.cldsmallversion = b.cldsmallversion) WHERE 1=1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.EIID AS EIID, A.EID AS EID, A.EILABEL AS EILABEL, A.EINAME AS EINAME, A.EIDESC AS EIDESC, A.EIVERSION AS EIVERSION, A.EIINSDATE AS EIINSDATE, C.CIVALUE AS X_VALUE, D.CIVALUE AS Y_VALUE, T.CIVALUE AS U_VALUE, E.CIVALUE AS U_TOTAL, F.CIVALUE AS X_WIDTH, G.CIVALUE AS Y_WIDTH, K.CIVALUE AS GRAPHSTATUS, L.CIVALUE AS GRAPHTYPEID, M.CIVALUE AS GRAPHTYPENAME, N.CIVALUE AS GRAPHINDEX, O.CIVALUE AS VOLTAGE, P.CIVALUE AS WEIGHT, S.CIVALUE AS WIDTH, Q.CIVALUE AS STANDARD, I.EIID AS ROOM_EIID, I.EILABEL AS ROOM_EILABEL, I.EINAME AS ROOM_EINAME, V.ESYSCODING AS CONTAINERTYPE, U.CIVALUE AS EITYPE FROM IG013 A INNER JOIN IG117 B ON (A.EID = B.EID AND (B.ESYSCODING LIKE '999001024001%' OR B.ESYSCODING LIKE '999001024002%')) LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 C ON (A.EIVERSION = C.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = C.EIID AND C.CLABEL = 'IG_0021') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 D ON (A.EIVERSION = D.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = D.EIID AND D.CLABEL = 'IG_0022') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 E ON (A.EIVERSION = E.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = E.EIID AND E.CLABEL = 'IG_0023') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 F ON (A.EIVERSION = F.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = F.EIID AND F.CLABEL = 'IG_0024') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 G ON (A.EIVERSION = G.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = G.EIID AND G.CLABEL = 'IG_0025') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 K ON (A.EIVERSION = K.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = K.EIID AND K.CLABEL = 'IG_0031') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 L ON (A.EIVERSION = L.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = L.EIID AND L.CLABEL = 'IG_0032') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 M ON (A.EIVERSION = M.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = M.EIID AND M.CLABEL = 'IG_0033') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 N ON (A.EIVERSION = N.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = N.EIID AND N.CLABEL = 'IG_0030') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 O ON (A.EIVERSION = O.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = O.EIID AND O.CLABEL = 'IG_0034') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 P ON (A.EIVERSION = P.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = P.EIID AND P.CLABEL = 'IG_0035') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (A.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL = 'IG_0104') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 Q ON (A.EIVERSION = Q.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = Q.EIID AND Q.CLABEL = 'IG_0036') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (A.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL = 'IG_0106') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 U ON (A.EIVERSION = U.CIVERSION AND A.EIID = U.EIID AND U.CLABEL = 'IG_0108') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG013 V ON (A.EIID = V.EIID) LEFT OUTER JOIN IG313 H ON (A.EIID = H.CLDEIID AND H.EIRRELATION = 'A' AND H.DELETEFLAG!='1') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG013 I ON (H.PAREIID = I.EIID) LEFT OUTER JOIN IG117 J ON (I.EID = J.EID AND J.ECATEGORY = '007')) TABLE1 WHERE 1=1

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT U.EIID, U.EID, U.EIDESC, U.EINAME, U.EILABEL, U.EIUPDTIME, U.EISTATUS, U.EIINSDATE, U.EIORGSYSCODING, U.ESYSCODING, U.ENAME, U.ELABEL, U.EDESC, U.ESTATUS, U.ECATEGORY, U.EKEY1, U.EKEY2, U.EKEY3, U.EMODELTYPE, U.EIVERSION, U.EIUSERID, U.EIUSERNAME, U.EISMALLVERSION, U.EIROOTMARK, U.FACILITATOR, U.CONDUDETIME, U.OPERATOR, U.COMPACTTYPE, U.CONTRACTPAYMENT, U.COUNTMONEY, U.LASTDATETIME FROM ( SELECT A.*,B.CIVALUE AS expectday,C.CIVALUE AS actualday,D.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,1 AS NUM FROM IG499 A LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 B ON (A.EIVERSION = B.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = B.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = B.EIID AND B.CLABEL='IG_0118') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 C ON (A.EIVERSION = C.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = C.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = C.EIID AND C.CLABEL='IG_0119') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 D ON (A.EIVERSION = D.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = D.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = D.EIID AND D.CLABEL='IG_0117') UNION SELECT E.*,F.CIVALUE AS expectday,G.CIVALUE AS actualday,H.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,2 AS NUM FROM IG499 E LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 F ON (E.EIVERSION = F.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = F.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = F.EIID AND F.CLABEL='IG_0122') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 G ON (E.EIVERSION = G.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = G.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = G.EIID AND G.CLABEL='IG_0123') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 H ON (E.EIVERSION = H.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = H.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = H.EIID AND H.CLABEL='IG_0121') UNION SELECT I.*,J.CIVALUE AS expectday,K.CIVALUE AS actualday,L.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,3 AS NUM FROM IG499 I LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 J ON (I.EIVERSION = J.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = J.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = J.EIID AND J.CLABEL='IG_0126') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 K ON (I.EIVERSION = K.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = K.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = K.EIID AND K.CLABEL='IG_0127') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 L ON (I.EIVERSION = L.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = L.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = L.EIID AND L.CLABEL='IG_0125') UNION SELECT M.*,N.CIVALUE AS expectday,O.CIVALUE AS actualday,P.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,4 AS NUM FROM IG499 M LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 N ON (M.EIVERSION = N.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = N.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = N.EIID AND N.CLABEL='IG_0130') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 O ON (M.EIVERSION = O.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = O.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = O.EIID AND O.CLABEL='IG_0131') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 P ON (M.EIVERSION = P.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = P.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = P.EIID AND P.CLABEL='IG_0129') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,5 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0134') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0135') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0133') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,6 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0194') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0196') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0191') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,7 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0201') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0203') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0198') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,8 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0208') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0210') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0205') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,9 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0215') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0217') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0212') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,10 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0222') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0224') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0219') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,11 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0229') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0231') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0226') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,12 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0236') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0238') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0233') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,13 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0243') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0245') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0240') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,14 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0250') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0252') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0247') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,15 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0257') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0259') LEFT OUTER JOIN IG050 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0254') ) U WHERE U.expectday IS NOT NULL AND U.actualday IS NULL

SELECT U.EIID, U.EID, U.EIDESC, U.EINAME, U.EILABEL, U.EIUPDTIME, U.EISTATUS, U.EIINSDATE, U.EIORGSYSCODING, U.ESYSCODING, U.ENAME, U.ELABEL, U.EDESC, U.ESTATUS, U.ECATEGORY, U.EKEY1, U.EKEY2, U.EKEY3, U.EMODELTYPE, U.EIVERSION, U.EIUSERID, U.EIUSERNAME, U.EISMALLVERSION, U.EIROOTMARK, U.FACILITATOR, U.CONDUDETIME, U.OPERATOR, U.COMPACTTYPE, U.CONTRACTPAYMENT, U.COUNTMONEY, U.LASTDATETIME, SUM( CAST( (CASE WHEN U.ACTUALMONEY ='' THEN '0' ELSE U.ACTUALMONEY END) AS DECIMAL) ) AS imprest FROM ( SELECT A.*,B.CIVALUE AS expectday,C.CIVALUE AS actualday,D.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,1 AS NUM FROM IG499 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 B ON (A.EIVERSION = B.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = B.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = B.EIID AND B.CLABEL='IG_0118') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 C ON (A.EIVERSION = C.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = C.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = C.EIID AND C.CLABEL='IG_0119') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 D ON (A.EIVERSION = D.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = D.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = D.EIID AND D.CLABEL='IG_0117') UNION SELECT E.*,F.CIVALUE AS expectday,G.CIVALUE AS actualday,H.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,2 AS NUM FROM IG499 E LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 F ON (E.EIVERSION = F.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = F.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = F.EIID AND F.CLABEL='IG_0122') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 G ON (E.EIVERSION = G.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = G.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = G.EIID AND G.CLABEL='IG_0123') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 H ON (E.EIVERSION = H.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = H.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = H.EIID AND H.CLABEL='IG_0121') UNION SELECT I.*,J.CIVALUE AS expectday,K.CIVALUE AS actualday,L.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,3 AS NUM FROM IG499 I LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 J ON (I.EIVERSION = J.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = J.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = J.EIID AND J.CLABEL='IG_0126') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 K ON (I.EIVERSION = K.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = K.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = K.EIID AND K.CLABEL='IG_0127') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 L ON (I.EIVERSION = L.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = L.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = L.EIID AND L.CLABEL='IG_0125') UNION SELECT M.*,N.CIVALUE AS expectday,O.CIVALUE AS actualday,P.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,4 AS NUM FROM IG499 M LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 N ON (M.EIVERSION = N.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = N.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = N.EIID AND N.CLABEL='IG_0130') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 O ON (M.EIVERSION = O.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = O.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = O.EIID AND O.CLABEL='IG_0131') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 P ON (M.EIVERSION = P.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = P.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = P.EIID AND P.CLABEL='IG_0129') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,5 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0134') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0135') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0133') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,6 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0194') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0196') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0191') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,7 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0201') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0203') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0198') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,8 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0208') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0210') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0205') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,9 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0215') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0217') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0212') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,10 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0222') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0224') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0219') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,11 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0229') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0231') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0226') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,12 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0236') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0238') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0233') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,13 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0243') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0245') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0240') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,14 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0250') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0252') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0247') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,15 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0257') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0259') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0254') ) U WHERE (U.expectday IS NOT NULL OR U.expectday <> '') AND (U.actualday IS NULL OR U.actualday = '')

GROUP BY U.EIID, U.EID, U.EIDESC, U.EINAME, U.EILABEL, U.EIUPDTIME, U.EISTATUS, U.EIINSDATE, U.EIORGSYSCODING, U.ESYSCODING, U.ENAME, U.ELABEL, U.EDESC, U.ESTATUS, U.ECATEGORY, U.EKEY1, U.EKEY2, U.EKEY3, U.EMODELTYPE, U.EIVERSION, U.EIUSERID, U.EIUSERNAME, U.EISMALLVERSION, U.EIROOTMARK,U.FACILITATOR, U.CONDUDETIME, U.OPERATOR, U.COMPACTTYPE, U.CONTRACTPAYMENT, U.COUNTMONEY, U.LASTDATETIME
SELECT A.*, B.CVALUE FROM (SELECT * FROM IG225 WHERE ESYSCODING IN (:esyscodingList) AND CSTATUS != '2') A LEFT OUTER JOIN IG611 B ON (A.CID = B.CID AND B.EID = :eid) ORDER BY A.CCATEGORY,A.EID,A.CID
SELECT A.*,'' cvalue FROM IG225 A WHERE CSTATUS != '2' and eid = :eid ORDER BY A.CCATEGORY,A.EID,A.CID

SELECT ci.* FROM ( SELECT row_number() over() as eiid, null eilabel, cname einame, '' as srename, C.cid, C.eid, C.cname, C.cdesc, C.cunit, C.cstatus, C.ccategory, C.cseq, C.clabel, C.coption, C.cattach, C.crequired, C.esyscoding, D.cvalue civalue, null ciid, null ciupdtime, null ciexpire, null cistatus, null civersion, null cismallversion, null civerinfo, null cicurver FROM ( SELECT B.eid, B.esyscoding, B.cid, B.cname, B.cdesc, B.cunit, B.cstatus, B.ccategory, B.cseq, B.clabel, B.coption, B.crequired, B.cattach FROM (SELECT eid,cid, cname, cdesc, cunit, cstatus, ccategory, cseq, clabel, coption, crequired, cattach, esyscoding FROM IG225 WHERE esyscoding in (:esyscodingList) AND cstatus != '2'

SELECT brpareiid, brparversion, MAX(brparsmallversion) AS brparsmallversion, brcldeiid, brcldversion, MAX(brcldsmallversion) AS brcldsmallversion FROM eibelongrelation WHERE brtype = '1' AND deleteflag = '0' AND eirootmark = :eirootmark AND brparversion = :brparversion AND brcldversion = :brcldversion GROUP BY brpareiid, brparversion, brcldeiid, brcldversion

SELECT * FROM eibelongrelation a INNER JOIN ( SELECT brpareiid, MAX(brparversion) AS brparversion, MAX(brparsmallversion) AS brparsmallversion, brcldeiid, MAX(brcldversion) AS brcldversion, MAX(brcldsmallversion) AS brcldsmallversion FROM eibelongrelation WHERE deleteflag = '0' and eirootmark = :eirootmark

GROUP BY brpareiid, brcldeiid) b ON (a.brpareiid = b.brpareiid AND a.brparversion = b.brparversion AND a.brparsmallversion = b.brparsmallversion AND a.brcldeiid = b.brcldeiid AND a.brcldversion = b.brcldversion AND a.brcldsmallversion = b.brcldsmallversion)

select u.eiid, u.compacttype, u.condudetime, u.contractpayment, u.countmoney, u.ecategory, u.edesc, u.eid, u.eidesc, u.eiinsdate, u.eilabel, u.einame, u.eiorgsyscoding, u.eirootmark, u.eismallversion, u.eistatus, u.eiupdtime, u.eiuserid, u.eiusername, u.eiversion, u.ekey1, u.ekey2, u.ekey3, u.elabel, u.ename, u.estatus, u.esyscoding, u.facilitator, SUM(CAST((CASE WHEN U.ACTUALMONEY ='' THEN '0' ELSE U.ACTUALMONEY END) AS DECIMAL)) AS imprest, u.lastdatetime, u.operator, b.orgid, b.fingerPrint, b.orgaddr, b.orgpar, b.orgcontact, b.orgdesc, b.orgfax, b.orginfo, b.orgname, b.orgparname, b.orgphone, b.orgstatus, b.orgsyscoding, b.orgtype, b.orgusercoding, c.orgid, c.fingerPrint, c.orgaddr, c.orgpar, c.orgcontact, c.orgdesc, c.orgfax, c.orginfo, c.orgname, c.orgparname, c.orgphone, c.orgstatus, c.orgsyscoding, c.orgtype, c.orgusercoding from ( SELECT A.*,B.CIVALUE AS expectday,C.CIVALUE AS actualday,D.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,1 AS NUM FROM IG499 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 B ON (A.EIVERSION = B.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = B.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = B.EIID AND B.CLABEL='IG_0118') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 C ON (A.EIVERSION = C.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = C.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = C.EIID AND C.CLABEL='IG_0119') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 D ON (A.EIVERSION = D.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = D.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = D.EIID AND D.CLABEL='IG_0117') UNION SELECT E.*,F.CIVALUE AS expectday,G.CIVALUE AS actualday,H.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,2 AS NUM FROM IG499 E LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 F ON (E.EIVERSION = F.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = F.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = F.EIID AND F.CLABEL='IG_0122') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 G ON (E.EIVERSION = G.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = G.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = G.EIID AND G.CLABEL='IG_0123') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 H ON (E.EIVERSION = H.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = H.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = H.EIID AND H.CLABEL='IG_0121') UNION SELECT I.*,J.CIVALUE AS expectday,K.CIVALUE AS actualday,L.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,3 AS NUM FROM IG499 I LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 J ON (I.EIVERSION = J.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = J.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = J.EIID AND J.CLABEL='IG_0126') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 K ON (I.EIVERSION = K.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = K.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = K.EIID AND K.CLABEL='IG_0127') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 L ON (I.EIVERSION = L.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = L.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = L.EIID AND L.CLABEL='IG_0125') UNION SELECT M.*,N.CIVALUE AS expectday,O.CIVALUE AS actualday,P.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,4 AS NUM FROM IG499 M LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 N ON (M.EIVERSION = N.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = N.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = N.EIID AND N.CLABEL='IG_0130') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 O ON (M.EIVERSION = O.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = O.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = O.EIID AND O.CLABEL='IG_0131') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 P ON (M.EIVERSION = P.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = P.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = P.EIID AND P.CLABEL='IG_0129') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,5 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0134') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0135') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0133') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,6 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0194') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0196') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0191') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,7 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0201') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0203') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0198') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,8 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0208') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0210') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0205') R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0215') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0217') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0212') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,10 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0222') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0224') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0231') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0226') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,12 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0236') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0238') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0233') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,13 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0243') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0245') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0240') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,14 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0250') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0252') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0247') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,15 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0257') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0259') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0254') ) u left outer join ORGANIZATION b on u.eiorgsyscoding = b.orgsyscoding left outer join ORGANIZATION c on b.orgpar = c.orgsyscoding where u.expectday <> '' and u.actualday = ''

select u.eiid, u.compacttype, u.condudetime, u.contractpayment, u.countmoney, u.ecategory, u.edesc, u.eid, u.eidesc, u.eiinsdate, u.eilabel, u.einame, u.eiorgsyscoding, u.eirootmark, u.eismallversion, u.eistatus, u.eiupdtime, u.eiuserid, u.eiusername, u.eiversion, u.ekey1, u.ekey2, u.ekey3, u.elabel, u.ename, u.estatus, u.esyscoding, u.facilitator, u.imprest, u.lastdatetime, u.operator, b.orgid, b.fingerPrint, b.orgaddr, b.orgpar, b.orgcontact, b.orgdesc, b.orgfax, b.orginfo, b.orgname, b.orgparname, b.orgphone, b.orgstatus, b.orgsyscoding, b.orgtype, b.orgusercoding, c.orgid, c.fingerPrint, c.orgaddr, c.orgpar, c.orgcontact, c.orgdesc, c.orgfax, c.orginfo, c.orgname, c.orgparname, c.orgphone, c.orgstatus, c.orgsyscoding, c.orgtype, c.orgusercoding from ig499 u left outer join ORGANIZATION b on u.eiorgsyscoding = b.orgsyscoding left outer join ORGANIZATION c on b.orgpar = c.orgsyscoding where u.eiid not in (select a.eiid from ( SELECT A.*,B.CIVALUE AS expectday,C.CIVALUE AS actualday,D.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,1 AS NUM FROM IG499 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 B ON (A.EIVERSION = B.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = B.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = B.EIID AND B.CLABEL='IG_0118') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 C ON (A.EIVERSION = C.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = C.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = C.EIID AND C.CLABEL='IG_0119') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 D ON (A.EIVERSION = D.CIVERSION AND A.EISMALLVERSION = D.CISMALLVERSION AND A.EIID = D.EIID AND D.CLABEL='IG_0117') UNION SELECT E.*,F.CIVALUE AS expectday,G.CIVALUE AS actualday,H.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,2 AS NUM FROM IG499 E LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 F ON (E.EIVERSION = F.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = F.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = F.EIID AND F.CLABEL='IG_0122') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 G ON (E.EIVERSION = G.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = G.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = G.EIID AND G.CLABEL='IG_0123') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 H ON (E.EIVERSION = H.CIVERSION AND E.EISMALLVERSION = H.CISMALLVERSION AND E.EIID = H.EIID AND H.CLABEL='IG_0121') UNION SELECT I.*,J.CIVALUE AS expectday,K.CIVALUE AS actualday,L.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,3 AS NUM FROM IG499 I LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 J ON (I.EIVERSION = J.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = J.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = J.EIID AND J.CLABEL='IG_0126') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 K ON (I.EIVERSION = K.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = K.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = K.EIID AND K.CLABEL='IG_0127') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 L ON (I.EIVERSION = L.CIVERSION AND I.EISMALLVERSION = L.CISMALLVERSION AND I.EIID = L.EIID AND L.CLABEL='IG_0125') UNION SELECT M.*,N.CIVALUE AS expectday,O.CIVALUE AS actualday,P.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,4 AS NUM FROM IG499 M LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 N ON (M.EIVERSION = N.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = N.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = N.EIID AND N.CLABEL='IG_0130') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 O ON (M.EIVERSION = O.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = O.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = O.EIID AND O.CLABEL='IG_0131') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 P ON (M.EIVERSION = P.CIVERSION AND M.EISMALLVERSION = P.CISMALLVERSION AND M.EIID = P.EIID AND P.CLABEL='IG_0129') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,5 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0134') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0135') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0133') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,6 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0194') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0196') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0191') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,7 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0201') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0203') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0198') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,8 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0208') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0210') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0205') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,9 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0215') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0217') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0212') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,10 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0222') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0224') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0219') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,11 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0229') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0231') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0226') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,12 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0236') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0238') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0233') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,13 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0243') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0245') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0240') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,14 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0250') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0252') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0247') UNION SELECT Q.*,R.CIVALUE AS expectday,S.CIVALUE AS actualday,T.CIVALUE AS actualmoney,15 AS NUM FROM IG499 Q LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 R ON (Q.EIVERSION = R.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = R.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = R.EIID AND R.CLABEL='IG_0257') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 S ON (Q.EIVERSION = S.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = S.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = S.EIID AND S.CLABEL='IG_0259') LEFT OUTER JOIN SOC0600 T ON (Q.EIVERSION = T.CIVERSION AND Q.EISMALLVERSION = T.CISMALLVERSION AND Q.EIID = T.EIID AND T.CLABEL='IG_0254') ) a left outer join ORGANIZATION b on a.eiorgsyscoding = b.orgsyscoding left outer join ORGANIZATION c on b.orgpar = c.orgsyscoding WHERE a.expectday <> '' and a.actualday = '')
